mesquite.meristic.lib

Class MMeristicDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • mesquite.lib.characters.MCharactersStates
      • mesquite.meristic.lib.MMeristicStates
        • mesquite.meristic.lib.MMeristicDistribution
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ItemContainer, MCharactersDistribution, MCharactersStatesHolder, Listable, Renamable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MMeristicAdjustable, MMeristicEmbedded

    public abstract class MMeristicDistribution
extends MMeristicStates
implements MCharactersDistribution
    A class for an array of meristic character states for many characters, at each of the taxa or nodes.
